short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QuoteUnquote emails you your Kindle highlights, as often as you like.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple way to have a selection of your Kindle highlights emailed to you. It's not often that I get the time to look through my favourite highlights. So, I decided to write an app that sends me a selection of those highlights via email, so I can read them with my morning coffee.
